comment: Story time : yr ago , my mother spent days on life support following a ruptured aneurysm and had subsequent brain surgeries to correct others . Her award winning , industry-leading surgeon at recommended her biological relatives also be checked for aneurysm .

comment: My GP at the time had to fight insurance to get the imaging done . He succeeded only bc I have a superior oblique myokymia and he was able to convince my ins co of my need for MRI w / & w / o contrast . I was relieved to see no signs of aneurysm at the time .

comment: It's been yrs . My new dr agrees it is time to be checked again . She has ordered a CT scan with & w / o contrast . Current ins has denied the test . Check out how a sports medicine dr who knows nothing about my history has determined I have no need of imaging . ( See attached pic ) <URL>
